attributes.title: disgusting, terrible, horrendous
attributes.review: i got this app to support the least racist and homophobic and sexist president there is! go president dump! but the information wouldn’t load. for example i bought tickets to go to president dump’s rallies, but i wasn’t told when the rallies were, so i wasted some of my money just to ruin president dump’s reputation. oh well, just don’t get this app fellow republicans 😘🥰😋

attributes.title: Never again
attributes.review: I’m pretty sure this app gave my phone a virus 🙄 I didn’t even know that was possible. I can’t believer this is still on the App Store.

attributes.title: awful!!
attributes.review: This app is so bad. It makes my phone crash and when I finally got into the app I had a strong urge to jump off a bridge.

attributes.title: Actually a Terrible App
attributes.review: This app is terrible, is buggy and slow. It’s difficult to work and overall just a really, really bad app.

attributes.title: The app called my whole family ugly😭
attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app, a screen popped up saying that my family was ugly, and that ill never have as much money as Mr. Trump🤧 It also punched me in the face🤕👁👄👁

attributes.title: crashes my phone
attributes.review: i have a relatively new phone and it was working properly up until i downloaded this app, now my phone won’t properly function at all, random apps crashing at random times, the phone randomly powering down, this was not an issue before i installed the app. please fix this

attributes.title: Awful! Disgusting!
attributes.review:
I downloaded this in app in hopes to learn more about cinnamon hitler and all that he is NOT doing for our country, and much to my disappointment, this app is just as much as a disgrace as his presidency! Ugh! Too bad! 

CANT STOP US TRUMPY HAHAHAHA XOXO GEN Z

attributes.title: Trump Train never left station
attributes.review: I literally couldn’t open this app. It would crash before anything loaded. I love America but I did not love this app. Just a mess.

attributes.title: This app isn’t helpful
attributes.review: Tried to get information constantly buffers so annoying

attributes.title: no 💕✨🧚🏼‍♀️
attributes.review: this app is so bad. it made my phone crash so much. i hate trump so i have no problem giving this app one star 💕let’s hope trump never makes another app again 💕✨🧚🏼‍♀️ #BLM #ACAB
